text: Muwatanze wang'holozenu Waisilaeli mbaka Mkulu Nguluwi hoyowadita wasindamale honhu hawo kota hemwe vyomsindamale, mina hewo nawo waihole isi iwele Mkulu Nguluwi, Nguluwi wa hemwe, kanguwapa kumwambu mwa lwanda lwa Yolodani. Homsinda ago moweza kuhiluka kuli isi ya hemwe, ayi muiholile ndiwapele.â€™
